metadata.title: CVE-2022-22942 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the vmwgfx driver that allowsunprivileged users to gain access to files opened by other processeson the system through a dangling 'file' pointer. Exploitingthis vulnerability requires an attacker to have access to either/dev/dri/card0 or /dev/dri/rendererD128 and be able to issue anioctl() on the resulting file descriptor. Systems without the vmwgfxdriver loaded are not affected.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
